type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="userAttributeMap"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="userAttributeEntry"> <complexType> <sequence> <element minOccurs="0" name="userAttribute" type="tns:userAttribute"/> </sequence> <attribute name="key" type="string"/> </complexType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="userNoteItem"> <complexType> <sequence> <element minOccurs="0" name="userNote" type="tns:userNote"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="supervisor"> <sequence> <element minOccurs="0" name="comments" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="employee" type="tns:user"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="endDate" type="dateTime"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="isPrimarySuper" type="int"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="orgStructureId" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="startDate" type="dateTime"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="status" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="supervisor" type="tns:user"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="supervisorType" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="baseObject"> <sequence> <element minOccurs="0" name="objectState" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="user"> <complexContent> <extension base="tns:baseObject"> <sequence> <element minOccurs="0" name="addresses" type="cont:addressMap"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="birthdate" type="dateTime"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="companyId" type="string"/> <element name="employeeType" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="expirationDate" type="dateTime"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="firstName" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="jobCode" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="lastName" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="lastUpdate" type="dateTime"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="lastUpdatedBy" type="string"/> <element name="middleInit" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="phones" type="cont:phoneMap"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="prefix" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="sex" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="status" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="suffix" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="title" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="userAttributes" type="tns:userAttributeMap"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="userId" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="userTypeInd" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="userNotes" type="tns:userNoteSet"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="userSet"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="userObj">
